```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Enhanced Booking System</title>
  <style>
    body {
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
      max-width: 600px;
      margin: 20px auto;
      padding: 20px;
    }
    .form-group {
      margin-bottom: 15px;
    }
    label {
      display: block;
      margin-bottom: 5px;
    }
    input {
      width: 100%;
      padding: 8px;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }
    button {
      background-color: #4285f4;
      color: white;
      border: none;
      padding: 10px 20px;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    button:disabled {
      background-color: #cccccc;
    }
    #result {
      margin-top: 20px;
      padding: 10px;
    }
    .success {
      background-color: #d4edda;
      color: #155724;
    }
    .error {
      background-color: #f8d7da;
      color: #721c24;
    }
    .time-slots {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(150px, 1fr));
      gap: 10px;
      margin: 15px 0;
    }
    .time-slot {
      padding: 10px;
      border: 1px solid #ddd;
      border-radius: 4px;
      cursor: pointer;
      text-align: center;
    }
    .time-slot:hover {
      background-color: #f0f0f0;
    }
    .time-slot.selected {
      background-color: #4285f4;
      color: white;
    }
    .weekend-message {
      color: #856404;
      background-color: #fff3cd;
      padding: 10px;
      border-radius: 4px;
      margin: 10px 0;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <h2>Enhanced Booking System</h2>

  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="date">Select Date:</label>
    <input type="date" id="date" required>
  </div>

  <div id="timeSlots" class="time-slots"></div> <!-- This is where time slots will appear -->

  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="name">Your Name:</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" required>
  </div>

  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="email">Your Email:</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" required>
  </div>

  <button onclick="submitBooking()" disabled>Book Appointment</button>

  <div id="result" style="display: none;"></div>

  <script>
    let selectedSlot = null;

    // Set min date to today and format it as dd/mm/yyyy
    const dateInput = document.getElementById('date');
    const today = new Date();
    dateInput.min = today.toISOString().split('T')[0];

    // Function to format date as dd/mm/yyyy
    function formatDate(date) {
      const day = date.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0');
      const month = (date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0');
      const year = date.getFullYear();
      return `${day}/${month}/${year}`;
    }

    dateInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
      const selectedDate = new Date(this.value);
      const dayOfWeek = selectedDate.getDay();
      
      if (dayOfWeek === 0 || dayOfWeek === 6) {
        showResult('Bookings are only available Monday through Friday.', false);
        document.getElementById('timeSlots').innerHTML = '';
        return;
      }
      
      fetchAvailableSlots(this.value);
    });

    dateInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
      const selectedDate = new Date(this.value);
      const dayOfWeek = selectedDate.getDay();
      
      if (dayOfWeek === 0 || dayOfWeek === 6) {
        this.setCustomValidity('Please select a weekday (Monday-Friday)');
      } else {
        this.setCustomValidity('');
      }
    });

    function fetchAvailableSlots(date) {
      const timeSlotsDiv = document.getElementById('timeSlots');
      timeSlotsDiv.innerHTML = 'Loading available time slots...';
      
      // Make the API call to the Google Apps Script Web App URL
      fetch('https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbz3SOzZGbOKWckXPh4Kfv07V-v3Om_Zsz-FnjCIJfyL_uSBLZFNCWeKbLWIdpoalObZiA/exec?action=getSlots&date=' + encodeURIComponent(date))
        .then(response => response.json())
        .then(data => {
          if (data.success) {
            if (data.message) {
              timeSlotsDiv.innerHTML = `<div class="weekend-message">${data.message}</div>`;
            } else {
              displayTimeSlots(data.timeSlots); // Show time slots if available
            }
          } else {
            timeSlotsDiv.innerHTML = 'Error loading time slots: ' + data.message;
          }
        })
        .catch(error => {
          timeSlotsDiv.innerHTML = 'Error fetching time slots: ' + error.message;
        });
    }

    function displayTimeSlots(slots) {
      const timeSlotsDiv = document.getElementById('timeSlots');
      if (slots.length === 0) {
        timeSlotsDiv.innerHTML = 'No available time slots for this date.';
        return;
      }
      
      timeSlotsDiv.innerHTML = '';
      slots.forEach(slot => {
        const startTime = new Date(slot.start);
        const div = document.createElement('div');
        div.className = 'time-slot';
        div.textContent = startTime.toLocaleTimeString([], { 
          hour: '2-digit', 
          minute: '2-digit',
          hour12: true 
        });
        div.onclick = () => selectTimeSlot(slot, div);
        timeSlotsDiv.appendChild(div);
      });
    }

    function selectTimeSlot(slot, element) {
      const selected = document.querySelector('.time-slot.selected');
      if (selected) selected.classList.remove('selected');
      
      element.classList.add('selected');
      selectedSlot = slot;
      
      document.querySelector('button').disabled = false;
    }

    function submitBooking() {
      if (!selectedSlot) {
        showResult('Please select a time slot', false);
        return;
      }
      
      const name = document.getElementById('name').value;
      const email = document.getElementById('email').value;
      
      if (!name || !email) {
        showResult('Please fill in all fields', false);
        return;
      }
      
      const button = document.querySelector('button');
      button.disabled = true;
      button.textContent = 'Creating booking...';
      
      fetch('https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbz3SOzZGbOKWckXPh4Kfv07V-v3Om_Zsz-FnjCIJfyL_uSBLZFNCWeKbLWIdpoalObZiA/exec?action=createBooking', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json'
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          startTime: selectedSlot.start,
          name: name,
          email: email
        })
      })
      .then(response => response.json())
      .then(data => {
        button.disabled = false;
        button.textContent = 'Book Appointment';
        showResult(data.message, data.success);
        
        if (data.success) {
          document.getElementById('name').value = '';
          document.getElementById('email').value = '';
          fetchAvailableSlots(document.getElementById('date').value);
        }
      })
      .catch(error => {
        button.disabled = false;
        button.textContent = 'Book Appointment';
        showResult('Error: ' + error.message, false);
      });
    }

    function showResult(message, isSuccess) {
      const resultDiv = document.getElementById('result');
      resultDiv.textContent = message;
      resultDiv.style.display = 'block';
      resultDiv.className = isSuccess ? 'success' : 'error';
    }
  </script>
</body>
</html>
```
